sentences.en: A laptop would be really useful for when I'm working on the train.
sentences.cn: 我在火车上工作时,便携式电脑真的很有用.

sentences.en: A: Would you like to have a laptop or a desktop?
sentences.cn: 你想要笔记本电脑还是台式机?

sentences.en: B OK, 10 am tomorrow. Shall I bring my laptop?
sentences.cn: B好的, 明天10点. 我需要把笔记本电脑带来 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you know which one is better, a laptop or a desktop?
sentences.cn: 你知道哪一种更好, 笔记本还是台式机?

sentences.en: Doing pretty well so far He does on - line auctions from his laptop.
sentences.cn: -他做得够好了. - 他用笔记本做网上拍卖.

sentences.en: He hit the ceiling after someone stole his laptop.
sentences.cn: 有人偷了他的笔记本电脑之后,他勃然大怒.

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比同类笔记本电脑小巧很多，但功能未减。

sentences.en: Laptop is suitable for use on planes.
sentences.cn: 膝上型电脑适合飞机上使用.

sentences.en: Microcomputer is a very small computer, such as a laptop or personal computer.
sentences.cn: 微机计算机是一种非常小的计算机, 如膝上机或个人计算机.

sentences.en: My laptop died on me again. I need a geek!
sentences.cn: 我的手提电脑又死机了. 我需要一位会摆弄电脑的老兄帮忙!

sentences.en: She used to work at her laptop until four in the morning.
sentences.cn: 她以前经常在笔记本电脑前工作到凌晨4点钟。

sentences.en: The cat was biting on the electrical cord to my laptop.
sentences.cn: 这只猫正在咬我笔记本电脑的电线.

sentences.en: The following figure is through surveys of students buy laptop price distribution.
sentences.cn: 下图是通过调查得出的在校学生所购买笔记本电脑的价格分布.

sentences.en: The stolen laptop of a Veterans Affairs employee has been recovered.
sentences.cn: 一退伍士兵的被盗手提又回来了.

sentences.en: The system precisely calibrates all of your CRT, LCD, and laptop displays.
sentences.cn: 该系统精确地测定你的CRT 、 LCD和笔记本电脑显示器.

sentences.en: You can do instalment to purchase things, e . g, laptop.
sentences.cn: 买某些东西可以分期付款, 比如笔记本电脑.

trans.tran_en: a small computer that you can carry with you
